entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 1:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: NW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
